author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MLS says dividend payment date on April 11
text:
April 2(Reuters) - MLS Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 2.47 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares for FY 2017, to shareholders of record on April 10
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 11 and the dividend will be paid on April 11
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ndqSkB
